>
>zhousp wrote:
>
>>>zhousp wrote:
>>>
>>>    
>>>
>>>>....
>>>>      
>>>>
>>>Would it be better to add this functionality as a mimetype-regex-filter
>>>that could be attached variously post-fetch-step?
>>>    
>>>
>>Where is the post-fetch-step,pls?  between extract-processors and 
>>write-processors? 
>>  
>>
>Yes. post-fetch would be all processing steps that follow fetching. Only
>here would a mime-type-regex filter make sense since only after fetch do
>we have a mimetype to filter.
>St.Ack

And I can't find a post-fetch process from the WUI's modules setting. so if we
have a filter,how can I insert into the order.xml? Insert a filter at the 
WUI's write-processors-----Archiver-----filters?
